meanings.definition: Cowpies: plural noun - dried excrement of cows used as fuel or fertilizer.
meanings.sent1: The farmer collected cowpies to use as fertilizer in his garden.
meanings.sent2: The field was covered in cowpies, ready to be used as fuel for the fire.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they saw the cowpies scattered across the field.
meanings.sent4: The smell of cowpies in the barnyard reminded her of the countryside.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the pasture, she carefully avoided the cowpies scattered around.

meanings.definition: Cowpies: verb - to step in or come into contact with cow excrement.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to cowpies when walking through the field.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally cowpies while crossing the pasture.
meanings.sent3: She groaned as she realized she had cowpies on her shoes.
meanings.sent4: The hikers tried their best to avoid cowpies on the trail.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's dog happily cowpies as it ran through the meadow.
